display_long_description:
Step into the stadium, grab your bat, and get ready to chase history in Pixel Cricket — an action-packed, single-player VR cricket experience like never before!

Play as the batter in a thrilling 5-over match, where you're up against smart fielders, alert wicketkeepers, and skilled bowlers delivering a mix of fast (inswing, outswing), medium pace, and tricky spin (off-spin, leg-spin) deliveries. Feel the adrenaline of facing every ball in full immersive VR, where timing, precision, and shot selection are the keys to victory.

But here’s the twist — you never retire! Even if you're "out", you continue batting till the last ball of the final over. Your mission? Chase the high target score set by the last match. If you reach or exceed it — you win. Miss it, and the victory slips away.

🏏 Key Features:

🎯 Target Chase Mode – Every match is a race against your highest score.

⏱️ 5-Over Showdown – Short, intense cricket sessions with non-stop action.

🧠 Variety of Bowling Styles – Outswingers, inswingers, off-spin, leg-spin & more.

🏆 Global Leaderboard – Compete to become the ultimate top scorer.

💥 Stadium Standee Boosts – Hit shots into special branded standees for double rewards.

🥽 True VR Immersion – Experience realistic cricket physics and stadium atmosphere.

Whether you're a seasoned cricket fan or a VR sports enthusiast, Pixel Cricket delivers a fast, fun, and highly replayable experience that keeps you coming back for “just one more match.”
